sentences.en: At the calligraphy competition, people asked him to write a few characters.
sentences.cn: 书法比赛会上, 人们请他留字.

sentences.en: He takes special liking to [ for ] painting and calligraphy .
sentences.cn: 他对于 书画 有很深的 癖好.

sentences.en: Her calligraphy as well as her painting can be rated as superb works of art.
Her calligraphy as well as her painting can be rated asworksart.
sentences.cn: 这一点在绘画和书法上尤其来得明显.

sentences.en: Her calligraphy was the clearest I'd ever seen.
sentences.cn: 她的书法是我见过的字迹最工整的。

sentences.en: His calligraphy is vigorous and forceful.
His effortless calligraphy has an unconventional grace of its own.
sentences.cn: 他的书法,信笔写来,十分超脱.

sentences.en: Is that so? How long have you been studying calligraphy?
sentences.cn: 是 吗 ?你学书法有多久了?

sentences.en: See a picturesque presentation of my calligraphy, Dragon traverses the Dharmadhatu.
sentences.cn: 请看一幅将我手书如画般地呈现表达的龙游法界.

sentences.en: Susannah won the calligraphy prize when she was at school.
sentences.cn: 苏珊娜上学时赢得了书法奖.

sentences.en: This calligraphy is poorly written and presents a humble show.
sentences.cn: 这幅字我写得不好,献丑了.

sentences.en: Was the Vice President of Yinchuan Painting and Calligraphy Academy.
sentences.cn: 曾任银川书画院副院长.

sentences.en: Your calligraphy is far from perfect.
sentences.cn: 你这笔字写得还不到家.

trans.tran_en: the art of producing beautiful writing using special pens or brushes, or the writing produced this way
